seo.whatIsContent: **AI Image Generation** uses **Gemini 2.5 Flash Image** (Nano Banana) to create images from text descriptions. Generate photorealistic images, artwork, illustrations, and designs using natural language prompts.
seo.howToTitle: How to generate images with AI?
howToSteps: Get a **paid API key** from [Google AI Studio](https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey)
Write a **detailed text description** of the image you want
seo.useCasesTitle: Use cases for AI image generation
useCases: Create **marketing visuals** and social media content

faq.question: Is this tool free?
faq.answer: No, it requires a **paid Google AI API key**. Cost is approximately **$0.0125 per image**. The API key is stored locally in your browser.

faq.question: What is Nano Banana?
faq.answer: **Nano Banana** is the codename for Gemini 2.5 Flash Image, Google's latest AI model for fast, high-quality image generation from text.

faq.question: How to write good prompts?
faq.answer: Be **specific and detailed**. Include style, mood, colors, composition, and quality descriptors like 'highly detailed', 'photorealistic', or 'artistic style'.
